api/petercashel.ModdersGearboxAPI.Attrib.title: Namespace petercashel.ModdersGearboxAPI.Attributes | Modder's Gearbox API
api/petercashel.ModdersGearboxAPI.Attrib.keywords: Namespace petercashel.ModdersGearboxAPI.Attributes Classes EventHandlersAttribute Add this Attribute to a class containing methods annotated with SubscribeEventAttribute Or a field in your FortressCraftMod class, with an class instance containing methods annotated with SubscribeEventAttribute SubscribeEventAttribute Methods annotated with this Attribute will be auto subscribed to events. Also works on methods placed directly in your FortressCraftMod class. Enums SubscribableEvents Events that can be subscribed to.
